subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The build of Giants third baseman Pablo Sandoval garners as much attention as his hitting, but the comments on his weight have not affected his play. Sandoval, nicknamed Kung Fu Panda, is hitting .316.
snippet: The build of Giants third baseman Pablo Sandoval garners as much attention as his hitting, but the comments on his weight have not affected his play. Sandoval, nicknamed Kung Fu Panda, is hitting .316.
